remark.ch: 大學部六大專長領域課程

goal.en: This is a one semester course for senior undergraduate and graduate students. It is aimed to familiarize and equip the students with requisite basis for doing research on thermal, fluid dynamics, energy technology and related fields. Prerequisite: Students are expected to have a basic knowledge of heat transfer and fluid dynamics. Basic skills in engineering mathematics (e.g., integration, differentiation, and differential equations) are also required.
goal.ch: 本課程為大學部熱傳學之深入延伸，幫助學生理解熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射的物理現象，使學生能夠利用的正確觀念，瞭解於研究實驗中或是實際應用上所遇到的相關問題，並且有能力分析結果，解決問題。 Prerequisite: Students are expected to have a basic knowledge of heat transfer and fluid dynamics. Basic skills in engineering mathematics (e.g., integration, differentiation, and differential equations) are also required.

content.en:
Chapter 1 Introduction
Cartesian tensors
Chapter 2 Governing Equations
Chapter 3 One-Dimensional Conduction
Basic Concepts, Lumped/Partially lumped formulation, Semi-infinite domain
Chapter 4 Multi-dimensional Heat Conduction in the Cartesian Coordinate System
Separation of Variables
Chapter 5 Multi-dimensional Heat Conduction in the Cylindrical Coordinate System
Bessel Functions
Chapter 6 External forced Convection: Laminar Flow
Boundary layer Theory, Similarity Solution, Integral Method
Chapter 7 External forced Convection: Turbulent Flow
Turbulent Thermal Boundary
Chapter 8 Internal forced Convection: Laminar flow
Developing Flow, Constant Heat Flux, Constant Wall Temperature
Chapter 9 Internal forced Convection: Turbulent Flow
Chilton-Colburn, Dittus-Boelter, Sieder-Tata, Petukhov, Gnielinski
Chapter 10 Free Convection Flow
Along Vertical Wall
In Enclosure“
